website_summaries.verdict: If you need an affordable portable laptop charger that can charge multiple devices, you'd have a hard time finding a model with more to offer for such a low price.
pros: Decent price point, yet it delivers lots of power
Can charge a laptop or Macbook plus two other devices at the same time
cons: Rare reports of faulty units that charged a few times, then stopped working

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to run my cpap medical device. It worked great ran all night and only went down one level. I also used it to charge my laptop and my camera batteries. I highly recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: russell Flaum

customer_reviews.title: outstanding performance - highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: STUNNINGLY it powered a 14" Dell Intel Quad Core i7 laptop drawing 19.5v through the standard plug-in outlet for 6 hrs before the laptop battery kicked in - the laptop power settings were at FULL performance (not optimized) to ensure highest power draw and played an ongoing Nest video feed delivered through a 5g home based wireless connection - truly the highest power drain possible on the brightest setting - if this is the ongoing performance for this device post-charge, on an ongoing basis, this will surely be the best battery power pack I ever owned ... highly recommended for anyone who travels extensively and can't depend on a readily available power source!
customer_reviews.author: ASU

customer_reviews.title: Worked well once!
customer_reviews.text: This think worked great the first time I used it. It charged my Mac book pro with only 50% power used. Now it will read full charge and when I plug something into the outlet it reads 1flashing light and will not charge anything. It still works at the usb chargers but this is huge for a usb power bank. The reason I purchased it was to be able to use the outlet and that doesn’t seem to work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Great battery , just don’t lose the AC charger!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a long lasting and multiuse battery/charger this one is great. Can charge multiple phones multiple times. It as enough power to charge my laptop almost twice. Couple of downsides. It’s heavy. It’ll weigh down a small bag fairly quickly. And two, don’t lose the AC charger. I lost mine. Even though the company was quick to respond, the company doesn’t sell replacements. After buying two different replacements, neither one worked. The only reason I bought a new one was because it was a deal of the day. Other than those two issues, it works like a charm. Hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: Sifugonzo

customer_reviews.title: Lacks Reliability
customer_reviews.text: Just when I started using this product exactly one month after buying it on Amazon. I noticed that this product never turns off. This is bad value for my money because I bought it for traveling and now I am afraid to take this along with me because this product never switches OFF. Despite not having put it to use it has started to show problems !
customer_reviews.author: Hish

customer_reviews.title: Questionable battery specification
customer_reviews.text: I bought an Omars black 80W power bank several weeks ago. The battery specification is advertised to be 88Wh/24000mAh, but actual label behind the battery pack says 88.8Wh/6.0Ah. The main reason I chose this particular product was a high battery capacity compared to its price. Since 24000mAh is equal to 24.0Ah, what I received is a quarter of the advertised capacity (unless there is a special way of calculating Ampere-hour). The product information on the website needs to be corrected.
customer_reviews.author: S-K Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good for power outage and for use at home but ...
customer_reviews.text: It does it job but ocassionlly it will get disconnected to the laptop and wont charge. The size of it is EXTREMELY huge and very heavy. Good for power outage and for use at home but not good for bringing it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Jen

customer_reviews.title: update
customer_reviews.text: Update of product after using for a few months. Product failing will not charge. After 5 months, very little use. Charger not charging. After review, Customer service shipped immideately, no questions asked, a replacement. Using this new one without issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador E G

customer_reviews.title: I CHARGE MY DRONE WITH IT!!! DJI MAVIC AIR 4 BATTERIES 2 TIMES
customer_reviews.text: Large, so if your looking for something small dont get this lol!! I use it to recharge my 4 drone batteries when I'm on the move. I love it 2-3 hour charge? let it charge overnight and it's full in the morning. Love it love it love it I'm going to get it's big brother!! DJI MAVIC AIR 4 BATTERIES 2 TIMES I have 8 batteries now with this thing!!! LOVE IT oh and the drone batteries are like $80 a pop soooo yeah lol
customer_reviews.author: Morgdwinst

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't turn off...
customer_reviews.text: The battery charged well, it charged other things... but then it wouldn't turn off. there's a button to turn it off, but it wouldn't turn off. So I just had to wait for it to discharge. It's a little frustrating when you can't be assured that the battery will be there and ready for you when you need it. But maybe I just got a bad one. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: stopped working properly!
customer_reviews.text: I have only use this product a couple of times thought it was working really good kept our devices charged but now I can't get it to power off. And of course it tells me I am past the time to return it.😤 I'm not happy!
customer_reviews.author: this game is awsome yoqu should get it

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the battery drain fully and stored for a couple months
customer_reviews.text: Loved it's ablility to charge and number of charges while it worked but It died after only a hand ful of uses, I would Guess part of the problem would be I didn't use it for a couple months and a battery was low and it must have killed it but when I went to go reuse it and plug it back in I thought it would charge right back up and it has not I'm very disappointed in this product like I said I used it for keeping different devices charged and it work great... Until it didn't, only worked for 8 months
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Getting nowhere near 24,000mAh
customer_reviews.text: After multiple tests, I can't get ANYWHERE near 24,000mAh out of this battery. Charging my MacBook Pro with the lid closed I can only get up to 5,303mAh, only 22% of the stated capacity. When charging from the pack there will certainly be some loss via heat, etc. but should not be anywhere near this level of inefficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I have just received this and had a chance to charge it once and use it and so far works well charging up my Lenovo Yoga Thinkpad 11e to a full charge(all the time took about 2.3 hours to fully charge and the thinkpad was on and under full use with multiple apps going etc.) using the a/c portion of the bank and a partial charge on a flip cell phone before needing to be recharged. so far does its job, I got it during a lightening flash deal from amazon and for the money is a great deal for me. All in all had to give this 5 stars to me is value for my $.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING !!!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen others buying this power bank that theirs stopped working after months of it being fine. I ran into the same issue. I use this for car trips (my car doesn't have somewhere to charge my phone for long rides) and camping (to blow up my air mattress). It stopped working or taking charge on my last camping trip and we couldn't blow up our air mattress. Absolutely ridiculous for a $70 product that I bought less than 1 year ago and only use for emergencies. Sent an email 5 days ago to customer service and haven't received any email back at all. Unreal.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: It has a lot of power
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger. It allows me to pretty much charge anything I need to from my phone to my laptop. I have a mac pro laptop - it charges it entire full cycle. If its only used for charging iPhones, you can charge to full cycles multiple time. Probably can last an entire week, if not more for charging phones. The battery itself is not heavy considering 24000 mAh. Check out the pic below for the size comparison. So far, I am happy with the purchase, I will check back in a few months to give an update on how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Useful but not strong
customer_reviews.text: This was ok with changing my Microsoft surface pro 4 and had the indicator light 1/2 power left. The use with Resmed auto Cpap 8-12 cm only lasted 6 hr and made me wake up suffocating. A much smaller batery lasted 7 hr one night and then another 6 hr the next night. I wish it had more use for my CPAP. Would love to try the 42000mAh batery and see if it last better. It was Not bad but need more then 6 hr Cpap use in care of emergency.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAELA LESSLER

customer_reviews.title: AC outlet on this does not work
customer_reviews.text: This battery works with USB cords, but the AC outlet does not work at all. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: xta

customer_reviews.title: It works well on small appliances like lamps,laptops and even powered a 19 inch tv
customer_reviews.text: This item is great used with an Extension cord it powered and 19 inch tv ,nvidia shield and a lamp for four hours,which was more than I expected for 80 buck,still look for one that can power ,a 40 inch and a Xbox one though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is unlike any battery pack I found while searching for one. Works like a charm. I am using it at work for Holiday lights as we are not allowed to plug them up. Works perfectly, with the initial charge already on the unit it kept the lights going for about 3 hours. I was advised to run the battery to empty before recharging it so the battery would remember it needed a full charge. After the holiday lights no telling what we will use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Cris D

customer_reviews.title: Handy Dandy Powerbank
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome utility device and you can experience the usefulness when you are out camping and it gets too hot, or the power goes out on a hot summer day; just plug your mini fan and enjoy the cool breeze. you can plug your laptop adapter and continue working normally. Its compact yet not heavy and can pack a punch. The blue LED's shows how much juice is remaining even in the dead of the night. This has become my travel companion. Highly recommended for power users who are on the go!!
customer_reviews.author: Suvarna

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient for camping
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this portable charger even though it is a little bigger than I would like it to be because I like the type that fit into my pocket without much attention gained from it. However, its been a pretty nifty tool because I charge it overnight and it charges all my electronics throughout the day, especially my phone. I've even used it for my computer a couple times and it worked perfectly. It charges my things pretty quickly compared to some other battery packs that I've used in the past. Might have to buy another one just to have around because its so useful!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: So Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to power my Motif Medical Luna breast pump and it has made pumping at work or on the go so much more convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Fails entirely, never used but does not work
customer_reviews.text: I only just tried to use it, after return window closed, and it does nothing. Complete fail. Will see if they try to address and I could change my review, but I needed this now and not happy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Woods

customer_reviews.title: long batter life, lots of options
customer_reviews.text: I use this to power a small 4K camera (BMPCC4k) with short battery life using it's A/C adapater and it gets me on average about 4 hours use out of it. It's not too heavy, decent size and helps a ton. I have used it to charge phones and tablets on location as well. It's got a TON of charge to it, so it's incredibly handy.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnyboo - PJR

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to power my partybox 100 on beach days, and it does the job perfectly! I can fully recharge my speaker while its in use and still have something left over to charge phones or other small devices and this thing is extremely portable, not sure what everyone else was complaining about related to its portability.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome M

customer_reviews.title: A huge, heavy, honking battery that lasts forever.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a way to plug my laptop in to keep it running a processing intensive program and brightness at full screen away from an outlet. Bought this, charged it to full, and it worked like a charm. It is HEAVY and BIG however, so not the super compact travel friendly thing you're looking for though. Battery life got me through 6 hours of this processing intensive program however, that normally drains my PC in about 1.5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Brian, an Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed just under a year of light use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea, and I enjoyed using it the 5-6 times that it worked. Now, just under a year after purchase (today is 4/26/19, purchase date was 5/1/2019) it has failed, will not accept a charge. This is the reason for the low rating. Have a warranty inquiry in, if the seller does well by me I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Alan G. Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Need something a little stronger
customer_reviews.text: I need to find a stronger one, this wouldnt charge my surface pro4 long enough to watch a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Breau

customer_reviews.title: Power for your devises = freedom!
customer_reviews.text: Do you carry a laptop for work, and find yourself in coffee shops or airports, scrounging around the floor looking for a spare outlet? Many of us have, and this charger can restore your dignity. Huge battery will last hours, not very bulky or heavy, and guaranteed to allow you to sit in a seat and do your work without fighting for outlets. USB ports to charge your e-cig, phone, ipod, etc. at the same time. Loving the freedom this charger gives me.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G

customer_reviews.title: Works great for iPhones and tablets!
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. I need to use a lot of devices in long periods of time without a direct power source so this works great. I do want to put it out there that there is A 110 power plug but I have yet to use because my computer uses a three pronged plug and this only has two. But for the intentions I use it for such as tablets and iPhones it works amazingly. I find this to be a good value for the price so far!
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: I hope I can get a resolution . Great product .... I got a defective model I guess .
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these . They both worked great but after 6 weeks or so , the on / off switch stopped working on the ac outlet plug . Trying to resolve with the company , Omars. I am past the Amazon return time policy .
customer_reviews.author: Mark Killingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great capacity
customer_reviews.text: This charger back has a better capacity than I expected; I've charged my macbook pro on it over two full times without it dying. It seems to charge pretty quickly, though I tend to just leave it charging overnight. As a test, I plugged my laptop as well as two different cell phones into it at the same time, and it managed to charge all of them at a pretty decent rate. The cell phones even report that they are charging rapidly, so that's a nice bonus. Overall, highly recommend this charger.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I like camping very much. But I couldn't charge my laptop before in the camp. Now this power bank finally solved my problem. Besides charging my computer, it can also charge my mobile phone and iPad. It looks beautiful and is easy to carry. It is a good helper for my camping life. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It won’t power my Dell laptop. It’ll power everything else but it won’t do my Dell
customer_reviews.author: PyK

customer_reviews.title: For low or moderate power needs.
customer_reviews.text: It does well with low power demanding devices. ie. cellphones, netbooks, etc. When I try to extend my laptop that is a power hog it stays on for maybe 4 min then the power supply shuts down.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Graybast

customer_reviews.title: Works for air mattresses when camping.
customer_reviews.text: Got this specifically for camping and it does the job. We use it to blow up our queen size air mattress which has a blower built in but needs an outlet. It takes about 1/4 of the charge to blow it up and another 1/4 to deflate it leaving enough power to charge our phones too. Only downside, which is kind of unavoidable, is the weight. I wouldn’t recommend it for backpacking as it would be like adding a brick to your backpack but we wouldn’t be bringing an air mattress in that situation anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk that doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought months ago and it worked once when testing. Now when I'm finally needing to use it regularly, I charged up and it does not work. As indicated in some previous reviews, 1 light flashes when off charger while showing 4 solid lights when on the charger. However, neither USB or AC work when connected to devices needing charged. Wish it wasn't past my return date because this was a complete waste of money. Stay away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whoah! Big battery
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my camera rig to hard wire power for my DSLR and monitor. This has endless power so I don't have to worry about running out long shoots. My only complaint is that the AC outlet has an ON/OFF switch and you have to turn it off when you're done. If you don't, when you go back to use the battery it will most likely be drained and dead.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Incredible battery can charge macbook and phone
customer_reviews.text: So far after testing this product on a daily basis to charge my macbook pro and phone, it has been able to charge both my macbook and phone. It really does charge at a fast speed, and it doesnt overheat. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: This battery pack is huge!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t tell by the pictures how big this thing is but that’s how you know there’s a lot of battery in it. I love the fast charge USB ports it charges my iPhone from 20 percent to 100 in less than an hour!!! I love how it has an outlet on there so anything and everything that needs to be plugged in on the go this does the truck! Super good deal for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Just like many other reviews - dead after 2 uses s
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit and tried it two times just on USB. Quit after 2nd use. Will not charge, no lights anywhere. Just dead. Sent to Amazon for replacement. Will update review after I've tried out the new replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Turbo Tony

customer_reviews.title: Discrepancy on charging by USB vs. The built in outlet.
customer_reviews.text: My only question is this.... Why if you use the plug outlet does it drain the battery faster vs. USB port? I used the USB port to charge and it only took 2% of the charger power to go 100% on phone. Use the outlet plug with cellphone wall charger to charge the same phone and it takes 10% of the charger power to go 30% power on phone. I thought that was odd.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria maguire

customer_reviews.title: Stands behind there product
customer_reviews.text: Got this powerpak 4 mos ago. Have been very happy with it. Short charge time, battery last better then others I have used. The the switch to the 120v broke. Sent this seller an e-mail. They were on top of it right away. Told me I was under warranty and they would replace it. All they asked was a simple and easy explanation on what was wrong. After I sent that to them I received my replacement Powerpak. GOOD JOB!! Thank you for a quick resolution to my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, emergency power kit but large and heavy
customer_reviews.text: It is a very huge power dock I ever had till now, want to give a try for camping and it worked so well. Didn’t even charge it for like a week for two iPhones. Surprisingly it also has 110V ac output plugin which is a good option in an emergency, I tried it on my mac too and worked fine. It is a very nice power bank but one thing I don’t like is it’s size, too large and heavy. I am not sure they allow this device on a plane, because I’m thinking to travel some long distance.
customer_reviews.author: Dipesh Manandhar

customer_reviews.title: Can't recharge it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in June but only used it once on a drive to Atlanta on a photo shoot and once it went to low battery I couldn't get it to charge fully ever again. I been trying to inform the company but haven't heard back from anyone as of today Dec. 28th, 2019
customer_reviews.author: john harris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this powerbank to take with me on my camping trips. I got a few good uses out of in the beginning. Months later for my next camping trip it stopped working! The lights would go on as if it was fully charged but it ended up shutting off completely and charging nothing! It’s a good buy in the beginning but such a disappointment. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Madera

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Power Bank
customer_reviews.text: Nice n heavy, packed with power! This is perfect for charging my laptop, ipad, and iphones, especially because it has a huge charging capacity. Be sure to catch it on sale sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Bhat

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and won’t charge.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to imagine how this is offered for sale or sells at all. It’s HEAVY (5 lbs or so?) plus the huge power chord / inverter is nearly as heavy. Impossible to travel with and just having it around the house is pointless. Plus after 6 Months in storage it won’t charge past the 1 light Mark. Complete garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Omars built-in AC outlet portable battery.
customer_reviews.text: This portable charger is a game changer! I love how it has a AC outlet to charge electronics that need a outlet. I was able to charge my small laptop and phone at the same time. A little on the bulky side, but it's lightweight. Very good built, doesn't have a cheap feel to it
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Definitely great value and works well
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the product for almost 2 months now and it works well. I have charged laptops, cell phones & even ran small PC's like the Raspberry PI and a small 7" monitor off of this battery. I would say the overall battery life is fair. I have not had any real issues so far, however, one time I plugged in my laptop and noticed it wasn't charging but all I did was turn the AC switch off and on again and it worked fine. Definitely a solid value.
customer_reviews.author: James81

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt turn off!
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't turn off. I hold the power button down and it doesn't turn off. I hold the power button down for a few seconds it flashes down the lights to one and then turns back on. I have only used the unit once. Very unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Mine is over 2 years old. I don't abuse it and it works perfectly. Charges my laptop and powered a TV for 2 hours. I keep it charged. It works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Random collections

customer_reviews.title: Battery Pack works great! Arrived 4 days ahead of schedule
customer_reviews.text: Battery Pack works great! Arrived 4 days ahead of schedule.!! Nowhere near the 5x recharge expectation the Seller's Rep told me...!¡!... More like 11⁄2x . . ... Emailed him the ASUS X502C Specs... Rep said he couldn't find the ASUS specs online, but found 3 different ones instead.-_-.the wrong ones.!! Insurance never arrived...!¡!¡ . . And aside from the worthless broken English Chinese translation locating the ports... Omars AC Power Bank... Works Great...!!! Charges in a couple hours..!!
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Capacity dropped to about 20% after about 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: The device is about 2 years old and the output has dropped to the ability to charge a note 10 twice. Too bad it's too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing charger. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing portable charger. I was always in need of a way to charge my laptop on the go, and this is the perfect for me. It stays charged for a long time and charges quickly. 10/10 stars. Amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: On/off switch breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: The on/off switch broke after a few uses. Now it just slides without actually triggering the on/off function, and it happen to break in the off position rendering it completely useless now for any AC usage which is really the only reason to have such a gigantic battery like this.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. McEwen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Bought for work. Using to keep surface pro tablets charged. WORKS GREAT. Last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: The AC outlet will only charge devices not power any plug
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to plug outdoor lights into since our porch doesn't have an outlet. It didn't work. I'm sure I didn't read somewhere that this was ONLY for charging, so I can't really fault the product. If you're looking for a way to charge your laptop, I'm sure this is fine. If you're looking for a portable outlet for outdoor lights, just buy solar lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Feder

customer_reviews.title: Charger with a punch
customer_reviews.text: This charger packs a lot of power. I went on a 4 day camping trip and kept two smartphones charged. The Power Bank only lost 25% of its power over that time. One nice feature is the ability to plug in smartphone fast chargers to power up your phone. While maybe too heavy if you are thinking of backpacking and saving weight, the Power Bank is perfect for most all other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One charge lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I needed a battery charger with an A/C adapter for my Alaska adventure and this didn’t disappoint! It lasted 6 days in the backcountry with having to recharge. It’s a big heavy but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well!
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job charging almost everything, except for my iPad Pro. Very convenient as the owner a remote marketing agency.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a power back up for my surface pro 5, so my expectations of use were that this would be a low usage back up. But just like other reviews, I charged it 3 times over a period of about 1.5 years. After the third charge it would no longer charge. Lasted just long enough to make it out of warranty
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Defective product.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I badly needed this for a project that had it shipped same day only to find it defective when I received it. I bought another kind the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Alot juice for many hours
customer_reviews.text: Nice product alot juice power my 17 inch dell for over 5 hours. Only down side is the ac outlet is only 2 pin but just works fine .good value no that heavy. Nice power bank
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Works as intended. A little on the heavy side. One of the only things I found that I can plug my laptop into.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Branco

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't made with ground in mind
customer_reviews.text: You'd think if it was advertised for a laptop, you could plug a laptop directly into it... No ground support, you'll need an adaptor
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bernier

customer_reviews.title: Great, until it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product, until last week when I attempted to charge it for use during an all-day meeting and got no response to being plugged in and no charge for use. I tried multiple outlets with no success. Very disappointed as my family is often on the road at all-day sporting events and this was very helpful when it did work.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Owens

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy- Not sure TSA Approved
customer_reviews.text: I returned because I was concerned about flight restrictions. But if I needed it other than my flight I would def purchase this item to use for other travels.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Yingling

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money unless you need something temporary!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item back in June. It worked great for about two months, then stopped working completely!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Boutros

customer_reviews.title: Powerful enough to make my printer work.
customer_reviews.text: I recently rented a storage which I will use as warehouse for my eBay business and I need to print labels so this battery is very useful. My favorite thing is I can charge it anywhere. Very affordable!!
customer_reviews.author: LetsBarkQuietly

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for several weeks, until on/off switch broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought this power bank to use with my laptop on the go. It worked quite well for several weeks and could fully charge my laptop several times over. However, the on/off switch for the AC outlet recently broke seemingly on it's own (I have not dropped it or roughly handled it). Now the AC outlet cannot be used. Not sure if this is a widespread issue or just a problem with my unit specifically.
customer_reviews.author: Jude Rajasekera

customer_reviews.title: Charges and re-charges at the same time
customer_reviews.text: It is possible to recharge devices while the "Omars AC Power Bank" is also plugged it. This allows me to leave it on a table top plugged-in, while using it as a charging station. That may not seem like a big deal, but I have a different brand that cannot do that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it does not power my heat embossing gun, but it does power my CPAP and hair dryer. Compared to other products I have seen, this is very economical. I will put it in the RV for when we are dry camping instead of the craft room. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dodi Callander

customer_reviews.title: Only both of the USB's worked. But neither the adapter nor the outlet plug works.
customer_reviews.text: Only the two usb ports worked, along with a select few electronics and small appliances (small blender) worked with the two pronged electrical side. The dc adapter also didn't work at all. So to say the least this is an expensive USB charger.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Useful, portable charger
customer_reviews.text: I never knew there was such thing as laptop portable charger. I know there is a phone power bank but for a laptop, it is so useful. I mostly use it in class, I like to sit in front where is far away from plugs and it gives hard time when my laptop runs out of battery. No more worries with this product.
customer_reviews.author: tugi

customer_reviews.title: so far a little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: No instructions in the box.. so far a little disappointed
customer_reviews.author: David Obeso

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!!!!!1
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product!! I've had it for 6 months and it charges everything over and over again. Please keep in mind that it takes at least 4 hours to charge the unit, but I don't mind
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Powered my cpap in the jungle
customer_reviews.text: I used this in the jungle in Hawaii for my cpap. Worked amazingly well. Could power a cpap for about a night and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have three different versions of Omar's chargers. All of them are fantastic. This one I have had for over two years now and it's still going strong and is reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: It breaks very easily
customer_reviews.text: After a few days of the purchase it fell two or three feet on a carpet floor then the on button stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: esther

customer_reviews.title: one failed after one use, now all won't hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: We bought five of these batteries. They each power a small water pump for nearly eight hours. After only one use and being very babied, one of the five batteries has already died and won't take a charge. Disappointing. After a year, and very little use, all the batteries now won't hold a charge for longer than a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: JL Darling, LLC

customer_reviews.title: works great during power outage
customer_reviews.text: Very effective. Able to charge phone and tablet 4 times during recent power outage.
customer_reviews.author: amelia d. becke

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that i can charge mutiple items at one time, filled my note 8s battery up several times and my iphone with out having to recharge the battery for about 2 days. This battery pack holds a charge well and i had no difficulty getting through tsa with this in my bag
customer_reviews.author: Shahira

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold a charge for long.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't hold a charge more than 2 hrs. Defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good for local use but not travelling
customer_reviews.text: Its good for the value but couldn't travel with it via any airport for security reasons s is big.
customer_reviews.author: Bashar

customer_reviews.title: Ac port switch
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a bit but is the switch for the a.c. port has come loose has that ever happen ?
customer_reviews.author: jeff fitzwater

customer_reviews.title: Portable charger
customer_reviews.text: This is the awesomeness thing I ever bought. I have used it for two weeks straight and it’s still fully charged. I had got it to last three weeks before charging it. I recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: portable ac plug
customer_reviews.text: haven’t used it for laptops. i recharge iphone and ac plug used for small devices at work for remote testing
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: perfect for C-pap
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my C--pap so I can go camping.
customer_reviews.author: SurvivalNathan

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: This battery bank works great for charging my laptop and smartphone at the same time for a long period of time. For being the cheapest battery bank I could buy, it is a great deal. I don't know what the reliability of it is yet, I would recommend buying a warranty for it just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Don't think it's worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel BUT it's big and bulky and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Quait

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Charged it once for a week and it ran a video transmitter for a live video feed for the whole week.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Reed

customer_reviews.title: No reply on warranty claim.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in April, 2019 and used it 3 or 4 times. As of November 2019, it will no longer charge. No response on warranty claim e-mails.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: This item is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this power bank on June 2 2019 and as of now I cannot use this item because it will not Hold a charge. I charge it and when I unplug it for use there is no charge to use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Because of it has AC output I could charge my laptop and camera battery easily. Thank of it 80W output
customer_reviews.text: this power bank is very powerful! I bring it, when I go to camping. Because of it has AC output I could charge my laptop and camera battery easily. Thank of it 80W output, the camping ground never as bright as it is this time.
customer_reviews.author: Aten

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome, I plan to get another one!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and call it my brick. It charges both a phone and a computer so it is great if you are out all day and need a charge.... Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy enough
customer_reviews.text: Travels easily and does what it is intended to do. The battery does deplete sooner than I'd like with a laptop attached. Otherwise, it is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: By E Artisan Jewelry

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fully charged. I’ve had it for a week and haven’t needed to recharge yet, awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Alot of Power Compact🔥
customer_reviews.text: Just started to use it works amazing!! You should get one works perfect and gave my gaming laptop a extra 2.5hrs of gaming while traveling on the plane. Great Metal body feels like cold steal with a good weight free sold and expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Delaney

product_meta.title: AC Outlet Portable Laptop Charger, Omars 88Wh/24000mAh 80W AC Power Bank with AC Plug External Battery Pack Laptop Power Bank Portable Power Supply Compatible with MacBook and Devices Under AC 80W
feature_bullets: 【Ultra High Capacity & Power】Omars AC Portable Power Bank is an ideal solution that allows you to charge your electric devices anytime, anywhere. Apply 24,000mAh capacity and 88Wh, it is powerful enough to charge such devices as a smartphone, tablet and laptop. Even better is you can bring it on the plane

【Fast Charging】The Power Bank with outlet has a high input and high outputs. These features make it possible to charge the connected device as fast as possible and recharge the power bank itself on high speed
【High Efficiency & Compact】Omars AC Power Bank is highly efficient and ensures the least possible loss of energy during the charging process. Dimensions: 4.91*7.4*1.73 inches (124.8x188x44mm)

【Omars Safety Check】Built in software under voltage and over voltage protection, Short Circuit Protection, Over-current Protection, AC Out Short Circuit Protection, AC Out Over-current Protection, Over temperature protection keep you safe when you on your trip.

【QUALITY ASSURANCE】We provide 12-Month Warranty; If you have any questions please contact our customer service via contact@omars.co anytime, OMARS team provide you responsive and professional service in order to ensure you an inspirational shopping experience
